detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#313-319):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#317)

HodlT.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#623-627) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,20000000 * 10 ** 10) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#626)
detectors.markdown:
[HodlT.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#L623-L627) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_mint(msg.sender,20000000 * 10 ** 10)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/HodlT.sol#L626)
